snippet: A federal judge ruled that Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz must show that they did not turn a blind eye to “red flags” that Bernard L. Madoff was engaged in illegal activity.
abstract: Federal Judge Jed S Rakoff rules that New York Mets owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz must show that they did not turn a blind eye to 'red flags' that Bernard L Madoff was engaged in illegal activity.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz must show that they did not turn a blind eye to “red flags” that Bernard L. Madoff was engaged in illegal activity.

headline.seo: Mets’ Owners Must Prove They Did Not Ignore Fraud
headline.main: Mets Face Burden of Proof in Fraud Case
